What features would you like to see in a: As a small business owner, I would like to see personalized budgeting tools that track my income and expenses, including automatic categorization of transactions and alerts for unusual spending. How often do you use mobile banking serv: As a busy small business owner, I use mobile banking services almost daily to manage my finances on-the-go. I check my account balances, transfer funds, and pay bills through my mobile banking app.

What would make you switch to a differen: If a different digital banking service offered better features and benefits, such as more personalized financial advice, lower fees, or better interest rates, I would consider switching. Additionally, if the user experience was more intuitive and user-friendly, that would be a big factor in my decision to switch. Finally, if the security measures were not up to par, that would be a dealbreaker for me.

If my credit union offers these features through their mobile app, I would be more likely to engage with them frequently.

I want to be sure that my data is protected from hackers and other malicious actors. Finally, I want to be sure that the service is user-friendly and easy to navigate, so that I can make the most of its features and benefits without feeling overwhelmed or confused.
